text: @frontpage_live @MeidasTouch I don't know who they think they are fooling. Only idiots will believe any statistics the #CorruptTrump administration releases. It must be stopped! The actual numbers are vital information in the fight to conquer Coronavirus & they are a matter of public and scientific concern.
